module.name: Parking Lot
module.description: Manages parking lot extensions and other options. Parking is a way of putting calls "on hold", and then picking them up from any extension.
module.changelog: *13.0.12* Add Park to your Assigned Lot feature code *13.0.11* Support drop down Alert Info *13.0.10* FREEPBX-10450 *13.0.9* FREEPBX-10657 Make id auto_increment *13.0.8* Adjust layout to allow slideout menus *13.0.7* FREEPBX-10447 Stop reverting destinations in parking lots *13.0.6* FREEPBX-9138 change int to bigint *13.0.5* FREEPBX-10217 Fix parking form *13.0.4* Remove duplicated numeric checker which is bad *13.0.3* FREEPBX-9542 Editing a Parking Lot Creates New Lot Instead *13.0.2* Version bump Beta *13.0.1alpha5* FREEPBX-9467 Update search hooks *13.0.1alpha4* No device null error *13.0.1alpha3* Restructure translations *13.0.1alpha2* FREEPBX-8904 Fix park return routing in Asterisk 13.2 and higher *13.0.1alpha1* Fix saving in 13 with PDO
